work.name: Squarepoint - NLP team
work.summary: Designed and deployed an NLP pipeline extracting structured information from over 1 billion documents for market insights, using filtering methods and a fine-tuned LLM. This led to a successful trading strategy that I elaborated. Built an AI based internal recruitment tool structuring resumes with regex/semantic search capabilities that was used by top management and led to the recruitment of key talents. Implemented a general purpose information extraction framework that was used by 5+ collaborators for various tasks.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Co-founded a game development business in addition to my studies, serving over 10,000 global customers. Demonstrated proficiency in managing large-scale Java projects and meeting production standards.

work.name: Pasqal
work.summary: Implemented the Orthogonal Quantum Tchebychev Transform into Pasqal's codebase, enhancing the expressiveness of Pasqal's Quantum Generative models. Established the first cloud endpoints enabling direct calls to quantum algorithms with parameter inputs.

work.name: Gendarmerie
work.summary: Experienced leadership as an officer in the Gendarmerie, a military equivalent of the police.
